definition: Queens, one of the five boroughs of New York City

sentences.english: Shou was bestowed by Empress Dowager Cixi when she presented the Empress with the embroidered tapestry, Eight Immortals Celebrating Birthday.
sentences.chinese: 寿被赋予慈溪太后她皇后绣挂毯，八老庆祝生日。

sentences.english: He went to Queen's College at Oxford, England.
sentences.chinese: 他去了英国牛津大学皇后学院。

sentences.english: Tracy: She took her first beauty title when she's 21.
sentences.chinese: 她在21岁的时候首次摘取了“选美皇后”头衔。

sentences.english: Once upon a time, there was a Queen whose surname was Ma.
sentences.chinese: 从前有个皇后姓马，她生活非常简朴。

sentences.english: You insult the Queen of Burgund in public with these lies?
sentences.chinese: 你居然在大庭广众下用这种谎言侮辱勃艮的皇后？

sentences.english: Some photos were of beauty queens in evening gowns or other high-status clothing.
sentences.chinese: 有些照片是身着晚礼服或者其他显贵衣服的选美皇后。

sentences.english: When his pawn reached the other side, it was queened.
sentences.chinese: 当他的兵达到另一边时，它变成皇后。

sentences.english: It is a great political event in initial stage of the tang dynasty to abolish and set up the queen.
sentences.chinese: 摘要废立皇后是唐朝初期的一个重大政治事件。

sentences.english: Looking for static son says will made her queen.
sentences.chinese: 找静儿说会立她为皇后。

sentences.english: Use Amway's cooker make dishes not only delicious but also healthy.
sentences.chinese: 安利皇后牌不锈钢锅煮出来的食物不仅美味而且健康。

sentences.english: Jack: When did Mrs Spink take the beauty title?
sentences.chinese: 斯宾克太太是什么时候成为选美皇后的呢？

sentences.english: When she heard this, she got red with anger.
sentences.chinese: 皇后听到这些话时，气得满脸通红。

sentences.english: When she saw her, she knew that the bride was Snow White.
sentences.chinese: 皇后看到新娘时，她便知道那是白雪公主。

sentences.english: XiaoFei smoke a empty visit queen dugu.
sentences.chinese: 萧妃抽了个空探望独孤皇后。

sentences.english: My king and queen, I was just entertaining your guests.
sentences.chinese: 我的王与皇后，我只是在招待你们的客人。

sentences.english: Learn about the queen of spades in this free card playing video.
sentences.chinese: 在此免费学习卡播放视频关于黑桃皇后。

definition: the emperor/Your majesty the emperor/His imperial majesty
to confer a title on (an empress or a prince)
